review: I love Amazon Fire TV.  Glad to cut the cord to cable.  There's a lot of channels to choose from, wide variety but you have to really spend time exploring.  Amazon could do better with providing an available channel list.  I got it with Amazon Prime but I must admit I am underwhelmed with Prime - they advertise their movie selection but in actuality it's quite a sparse movie selection.  If you're into movies, there's other selections for movies.  But if you want TV shows, documentaries and exercise then Prime is a good choice.
